lead_paragraph: Under pressure to uphold liberal values in a climate of rising populism, Chancellor Merkel will run for re-election next year.

headline.print_headline: Merkel Will Seek 4th Term as Leader of Germany
headline.main: Angela Merkel to Seek 4th Term as Germany’s Leader

snippet: Under pressure to uphold liberal values in a climate of rising populism, Chancellor Merkel will run for re-election next year....
abstract: German Chancellor Angela Merkel announces she will seek fourth term in 2017; stresses importance of decision in face of challenges confronting Germany, and rejects notion that she is defender of Western liberalism amid rising global nationalism and victory of Donald J Trump.
